results.title: Berry Spinach Salad with Maple Cinnamon Roasted Chickpeas and Balsamic Dressing

steps.step: Preheat the oven to 350F. Line a baking sheet with a silipat or parchment paper.

Drain and rinse chickpeas and then roll them around in a paper towel until they're very dry. The more dry, the more crunchy. The more skin that comes off the chickpeas, the better!In a medium bowl, stir together chickpeas, maple syrup, oil, cinnamon and salt.

Pour onto prepared pan and bake for 35-40 minutes, tossing around with a spatula every 15 minutes.Meanwhile, whisk together all the dressing ingredients in a medium bowl. I like to add all the ingredients to a mason jar and just shake it until combined.
Place the salad ingredients in a large serving bowl. Toss everything together to combine.
Pour dressing over top just prior to serving and stir to combine.
Garnish with a few roasted almonds.Store any extra roasted chickpeas in an air-tight container. They will get less crunchy over time.

ingredients.name: almonds
ingredients.original: ½ cup roasted and salted almonds, chopped
ingredients.originalString: ½ cup roasted and salted almonds, chopped

ingredients.name: bell pepper
ingredients.original: Freshly ground black pepper, to taste
ingredients.originalString: Freshly ground black pepper, to taste
ingredients.originalName: Freshly ground black pepper, to taste

ingredients.name: chickpeas
ingredients.original: 1-15oz can chickpeas, drained, rinsed and patted dry
ingredients.originalString: 1-15oz can chickpeas, drained, rinsed and patted dry
ingredients.originalName: chickpeas, drained, rinsed and patted dry

ingredients.name: grapeseed oil
ingredients.original: 1 tsp grapeseed oil (or coconut oil, melted)

steps.step: In a large salad bowl, combine the first six ingredients. In a jar with a tight-fitting lid, combine the oil, vinegar, mint and salt; shake well. Cover and refrigerate for at least 1 hour. Just before serving, shake dressing and drizzle over salad; toss to coat.
Garnish with additional pansies if desired.

In a large salad bowl, combine the first six ingredients. In a jar with a tight-fitting lid, combine the oil, vinegar, mint and salt; shake well. Cover and refrigerate for at least 1 hour. Just before serving, shake dressing and drizzle over salad; toss to coat.
Garnish with additional pansies if desired.

results.creditsText: Foodista.com – The Cooking Encyclopedia Everyone Can Edit
results.title: Raspberry Arugula Side Salad

steps.step: Place all the ingredients into a salad bowl (excluding the raspberries) and toss well.
Add salt to taste. Top with raspberries but do not mix in as they get crushed easily.

results.creditsText: Foodista.com – The Cooking Encyclopedia Everyone Can Edit
results.title: Raspberry Arugula Side Salad

steps.step: Place all the ingredients into a salad bowl (excluding the raspberries) and toss well.
Add salt to taste. Top with raspberries but do not mix in as they get crushed easily.
In a large resealable plastic bag, combine 2 tablespoons oil and 1 tablespoon vinegar; add the steak. Seal bag and turn to coat; refrigerate for 1 hour.
Place onion and green pepper on a double thickness of heavy-duty foil (about 12 in. square). Fold foil around vegetables and seal tightly.; set aside.

Drain and discard marinade. Using long-handled tongs, moisten a paper towel with cooking oil and lightly coat the grill rack. Grill steak, covered, over medium heat for 6-8 minutes on each side or until meat reaches desired doneness (for medium-rare, a meat thermometer should read 145°; medium, 160°; well-done, 170°).
Grill vegetable packet, covered, for 8-10 minutes or until crisp-tender. Open foil carefully to allow steam to escape.

Let steak stand for 5 minutes. Meanwhile, in a large bowl, combine the salad greens, raspberries and grilled vegetables. In a small bowl, whisk the salt, pepper and remaining oil and vinegar; pour over salad and toss to coat. Slice steak across the grain; arrange over salad.

ingredients.name: olive oil
ingredients.original: 5 tablespoons plus 1 teaspoon olive oil, divided
ingredients.originalString: 5 tablespoons plus 1 teaspoon olive oil, divided

ingredients.name: red onion
ingredients.original: 1/2 medium red onion, sliced and separated into rings
ingredients.originalString: 1/2 medium red onion, sliced and separated into rings
ingredients.originalName: red onion, sliced and separated into rings

ingredients.name: red onion
ingredients.original: 1/2 medium red onion, sliced and separated into rings
ingredients.originalString: 1/2 medium red onion, sliced and separated into rings
ingredients.originalName: red onion, sliced and separated into rings
